com.owlike.genson.ext.jaxrs

Class UrlQueryParamFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.owlike.genson.ext.jaxrs.UrlQueryParamFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RuntimePropertyFilter, javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestFilter

    public class UrlQueryParamFilter
extends Object
implements RuntimePropertyFilter, javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestFilter
    This class will include or exclude (depending on how it is configured) the properties during ser/de based on the content of the query string.

        public void filter(javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestContext containerRequestContext)

        IOException

      • inclusionFilter

        public UrlQueryParamFilter inclusionFilter(boolean yes)
        If true this will behave as an inclusion filter. Meaning that only properties that are present in the query params will be included during ser/de. If false all properties are included by default and only the ones from the query params are excluded. True by default.

      • paramName

        public UrlQueryParamFilter paramName(String queryParamName)
        The name of the query parameter to get the properties to filter. Called "filter" by default.

      • splitBy

        public UrlQueryParamFilter splitBy(String pattern)
        When defined it will be used to split every param value into property names. This allows to use the filter in a non standard way like : localhost/foo?filter=age,name,gender
